name: DIALUP Project
description: Uplift the Chinatown community's digital literacy by becoming a community mentor of the DIALUP Project! After going through digital basics and instructor training in the Fall, you will provide real-time, hands-on support for community groups. Along with gaining leadership experience and giving back to the community, after fulfilling the completion criteria (i.e., complete training and attend at least 8 hours of community training), you will get to keep the digital device that you used during the

howToGetIt: Complete the Google Form application, and a staff member will contact you if you have been accepted.
